titleStmt.title: Däbrä Sahәl Qәddus Mikaʾel Bet Mäḵaʿ

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / beta maṣāḥǝft

place.placeName: Däbrä Sahәl Qәddus Mikaʾel Bet Mäḵaʿ
Mikaʾel Bet Mäḵaʿ / Bet Mäḵaʿ Qәddus Mikaʾel
place.settlement: wäräda Ganta ʾAfäsum, ṭabiya Bǝkot, qušät Bet Mäḵaʿ

note.ab: Gädam. A small associated gäṭär-church is dedicated to Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus (GMBM). Tabots (3): Trinity, Michael, Täklä Haymanot.

23 Mss. photographed: DSM-001 "Dǝggwa"; DSM-002 "Four Gospels"; DSM-003 "The Homily of St. Michael"; DSM-004 "Miracles of Jesus"; DSM-005 "Synaxarion (the first half of the year)"; DSM-006 "The Vita of Täklä Haymanot"; DSM-007 "The Book of the Funeral Rite"; DSM-008 "The Prayer of the Incense"; DSM-009 "Antiphonary"; DSM-010 "Synaxarion (the first half of the year)"; DSM-011 "Collection of Prayers"; DSM-012 "The Homily of St. Michael"; DSM-013 "The Faith of the Fathers"; DSM-014 "Antiphonary"; DSM-015 "Missal"; DSM-016 "Psalter"; DSM-017 "The Vita of the Righteous ones, The Homily of the Sabbath of Christianity"; DSM-018 "The Homily of the Sabbath of Christianity"; DSM-019 "Collections of Prayers"; DSM-020 "The Book of the Marriage Ritual"; DSM-021 "1) The Book of the Baptism, 2) The Miracles of Mary"; DSM-022 "The Vita of ʾAbunä ʾArägawi"; DSM-023 "The Homily of St. Raphael"
